title: Candlestick, in the form of Angel
provenance_text:
Howard A. Noble [1874-1964], Pittsburgh, PA until April 30, 1964; estate of Howard A. Noble; bequest to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, September 1966.

Notes:
[1]. The work was transferred from the Noble residence to the museum with the rest of Mr. Noble's collection. Correspondence with the estate trustee (see donor file) and Museum Committee meeting minutes indicate that it was subsequently acquired from the estate at the appraised value with funds provided by Mr. Noble's bequest. It was accessioned in September 1966.




Under review by CGK
